channel.title: Stuff stays when you log out and log back in? PLEASE ANSWER
channel.description:
This is happening with my character design... the color stays but the other things go back to default.
Weapon emotes work but you have to reequip after logging back in for them to work.
This is really annoying please help :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2007, 04:24:29 PM[/size][hr]No one EVER answers me??!
